reviewText: Sally delivers a strong performance as a woman with unbending determination in the face of impossible odds during the Depression. (She won the Oscar for Best Actress for this role.) Great characters, good acting and lots of conflict.  The film loses steam, however, about  two-thirds of the way through. A good movie worth watching.
